001package imagingbook.lib.util.choice;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
004import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
005import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
006import java.lang.annotation.Target;
007
008/**
009 * Defines an annotation to mark nested (member) subclasses within a class or interface
010 * to be eligible as choices to be instantiated.
011 * @see Choices
012 * @author WB
013 *
014 */
015@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
016@Target({ElementType.TYPE})
017public @interface DeclareChoice {
018        public String value() default "";
019}
